item.title: Democrats, who bludgeoned Trump on immigration in term 1, have grown quiet
item.description: Democrats struggle to counter Trump’s tougher policies on immigration.

item.title: Trump pardons major drug traffickers despite his anti-drug rhetoric
item.description: The president has granted clemency to about 100 people accused of drug-related crimes during his two terms in office, a Post analysis shows.

item.title: Venezuela’s Maduro, shaken but still standing, aims to wait out Trump
item.description: Five months into the U.S. military buildup in the Caribbean, Venezuelan President Nicolás Maduro is feeling the pressure but refusing to go into exile...

item.title: Trump lashes out at Cuellar for running again as a Democrat after pardon
item.description: Rep. Henry Cuellar, who was charged with bribery in 2024, says he is firmly a Democrat but a bipartisan one who can work with the president.

item.title: Mom of Karoline Leavitt’s nephew rejects White House narrative of her ICE arrest
item.description: In an interview, Bruna Ferreira, who chose the White House press secretary as her son’s godmother, contested the portrayal of her as a criminal, absen...
